restrictedApps.title: Restricted Apps
restrictedApps.description: The access for these app is restricted. You have to wait a fixed amount of time for these apps to boot up.

restrictedApp.title: Restricted App
restrictedApp.description: This app won't open until the timer runs out. You can change the timer settings in the option menu
